description.value: Whether you're shoving opponents with a shield or a large weapon, you've learned to push them even further. Increase the distance you Shove your opponent with Aggressive Block or Brutish Shove to 10 feet on a success or 20 feet on a critical success. When you use Aggressive Block, you can choose whether the target is Off-Guard or Shoved. When you make a Brutish Shove, you also Shove the target 5 feet on a failure.
